experience: You and Mac both know Curtis Gunn, Chase Norlin, and 66 others

Interesting chat last night at Galvanize Inc w/ Todd P. Belfer of Canal Partners, LLC.  Great advise to AZ entrepreneurs on knowing your market, identifying how you're going to win, & the importance of positive company culture to spark growth.  Thanks to Startup Grind for hosting! #yesphx
Today is my last day at TriMed.  7 years.  3 roles.  Countless relationships, sales achievements, marketing projects and lessons learned.

It's an incredibly bittersweet day.  I'll miss a lot of things, but mostly I'll miss my salespeople, my clients and my TriMed brethren.  Nevertheless, I'm absolutely giddy with excitement.  I'll be taking some time off, and then I'll be starting my own consulting company focusing on medical device startups and foreign entrants to the US!

Founder and Chief Executive Officer at Celebrities Squared Inc.
October 12, 2016, Ben worked with Mac in different groups

I have had the privilege of getting to see Mac benefit the Healthcare Industry with is intelligence, with his desire to learn and support new medical technologies. His forward thinking has lead to the creation of a game changing, smart and beyond useful new technology for both consumers and business owners outside of medical devices. I had the personal pleasure of being able to use the Splyt Easy App at a participating restaurant. The App made opening and closing my bill the easiest I've ever experienced! I did not have to exchange a credit card or cash and my wonderful waitress was tipped as normal! Once consumers get to pay their dining bills and beyond with the Splyt Easy App, they will not want to use anything else again!

summary: Diverse background including: working as a Product Manager and assisting in the development of an imaging modality, to being a Sales Representative with a bag of medical products from orthopedic implants to durable medical equipment, to working as a Regional Sales Manager of a multi-state territory. Entrepreneurial experience applying for a patent, raising capital, taking a product to market and managing a company.
name: Mac Fortune
